MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G72 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.20pm to carry out repairs to an underground cable fault at Gartmore Terrace and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.53am on Monday 28th December 2020.
